T02D2315:260b-1: au pa de sha k'a ya pra d'i pa n'a ma /
T02D2315:260b-3: man ngag sku'i sgron ma zhes byas ba //
T02D2315:260b-4: 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2315:260b-5: rgyal ba'i sku ni gcig nyid la //
T02D2315:260b-6: gdul bya'i mos pa'i dbang gis ni //
T02D2315:260b-7: phyi nang gsang ba gsum du snang //
T02D2315:260b-8: bde gshegs sprul pa sna tshogs ston //
T02D2315:260b-9: yab ni thabs kyi rang bzhin la //
T02D2315:260b-10: yum ni shes rab rang bzhin te //
T02D2315:260b-11: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa //
T02D2315:260b-12: thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bo yin //
T02D2315:260b-13: las dang thugs rje'i dbang gis ni //
T02D2315:260b-14: la la zhi zhing la khro //
T02D2315:260b-15: zhi bas phan par ma gyur na //
T02D2315:260b-16: khro bo de bzhin gshegs pas bstan //
T02D2315:260b-17: gdod nas dag pa'i snying po la //
T02D2315:260b-18: gzugs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan //
T02D2315:260b-19: rang rgyud dngos po ma yin par //
T02D2315:260b-20: rang dbang can gyi sku nyid do //
T02D2315:261a-2: sems can lta bu ma yin te /
T02D2315:261a-3: skye rga na 'chi rang gis shes //
T02D2315:261a-4: zhen pa rnams las 'da' tshul ston //
T02D2315:261a-5: skye dang 'chi ba mi dmigs pas //
T02D2315:261a-6: bag chags lus las grol gyur nas //
T02D2315:261a-7: rdo rje lta bu'i sku yin pas //
T02D2315:261a-8: bltas pa tsan gyis dri ma 'dag / mtshan gzhi dri med me long la //
T02D2315:261a-10: zung 'jug blo gros ngo bor rtogs //
T02D2315:261a-11: gnyug ma dar ldan me long la //
T02D2315:261a-12: bcud dang rtsal sbyong gzugs brnyan 'char //
T02D2315:261a-13: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor rtogs //
T02D2315:261a-16: bsgom du med pa'i ngo bor rtogs //
T02D2315:261a-17: shes rab gsum gyi me long la //
T02D2315:261a-18: yon tan mtha' dag gzugs brnyan 'char //
T02D2315:261a-19: yengs su med pa'i ngo bor rtogs //
T02D2315:261a-20: bcu gcig ldan pa'i dam pa la //
T02D2315:261a-21: brgyad dang ldan pa'i slob ma yis //
T02D2315:261a-22: zhabs kyi padmar rab btud nas //
T02D2315:261a-23: ma nyams gsum gyis mchod pa dbul //
T02D2315:261a-24: nges pa'i shes pa skyes gyur nas //
T02D2315:261a-25: spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2315:261a-26: ma 'dres gcig tu rtogs pa yis //
T02D2315:261a-27: dus 'di nyid la rdzogs sangs rgyas //
